import GuitarCard from './guitar-card'; import { Guitar } from '../types/types'; import Pagination from './pagination'; type CatalogCardProps = { guitars:Guitar []; }; function CatalogCard({guitars}: CatalogCardProps): JSX.Element { return (

{guitars && guitars.map((guitar: Guitar) => ( ))}
); } export default CatalogCard;
